-- expect.avdl --
@namespace("ns1.sub")
protocol _ {
	/** doc comment at top level */
	@go.package("example.com/blah")
	@structuredMeta({
		"x": 356,
		"y": "foo"
	})
	record R {
		/** doc comment on field */
		@fieldMetadata(245)
		map<string> fmap;
		/**
		 * doc comment on field with
		 * newline
		 */
		string fstrWithDefault = "";
		string fStrNoDefault = "";
		@logicalType("timestamp-micros")
		long fTime = 0;
		array<int> fArray;
		ns2.S fRef;
		/** Note: IDL doesn't support enum defaults! See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AVRO-2866 */
		ns3.color col;
		md5 checksum;
		union {
			null,
			long,
			ns2.S
		} unionField;
		union { null, long } smallUnionField;
	}

	@namespace("ns2")
	record S {
		string fs;
	}

	@namespace("ns3")
	enum color {
		red,
		blue,
		green
	}

	fixed md5(16);
}
